name: Sally's Lunch
description:
I created everything for this game myself, art , code everything. It was a fun 7 week project learning about creating a mobile game and it's limitations. I converted the screen ratios to work with windows and mac but the game is designed to be played on mobile not on mac or windows (I wanted others to be able to try the game without an android). Game dev journal for this game and another projects I've been working on:

https://ebeneyrussell.tumblr.com/ 

My website:

https://ebeneyrussell.wixsite.com/website
